title: Michael Zezas: The Fed Rate Cut Debate for Bond Investors
description: On today’s podcast, Head of Public Policy and Municipal Strategy Michael Zezas considers the debate between the consensus view of a potential 25 basis point Fed rate cut vs a 50 basis point cut.
